verses.verse: And the third <WG5154> day <WG2250> there was a marriage <WG1062> in Cana <WG2580> of Galilee; <WG1056> and the mother <WG3384> of Jesus <WG2424> was there: <WG1563>
And both <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> was called, <WG2564> and his disciples, <WG3101> to the marriage. <WG1062>
And when they wanted <WG5302> wine, <WG3631> the mother <WG3384> of Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, They have <WG2192> no <WG3756> wine. <WG3631>
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to her, Woman, <WG1135> what <WG5101> have I to do with you? my <WG3450> hour <WG5610> is not yet <WG3768> come. <WG2240>
His mother <WG3384> said <WG3004> to the servants, <WG1249> Whatever <WG3748> <WG302> he said <WG3004> to you, do <WG4160> it.

And there were set <WG2749> there <WG1563> six <WG1803> water pots <WG5201> of stone, <WG3035> after <WG2596> the manner of the purifying <WG2512> of the Jews, <WG2453> containing <WG5562> two <WG1417> or <WG2228> three <WG5140> firkins <WG3355> apiece. <WG303>
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, Fill <WG1072> the water pots <WG5201> with water. <WG5204> And they filled <WG1072> them up to the brim. <WG507>
And he said <WG3004> to them, Draw <WG501> out now, <WG3568> and bear <WG5342> to the governor <WG755> of the feast. <WG755> And they bore <WG5342> it.

When <WG5613> the ruler <WG755> of the feast <WG755> had tasted <WG1089> the water <WG5204> that was made <WG1096> wine, <WG3631> and knew <WG1492> not from where <WG4159> it was: (but the servants <WG1249> which <WG3588> drew <WG501> the water <WG5204> knew; <WG1492>) the governor <WG755> of the feast <WG755> called <WG5455> the bridegroom, <WG3566>

And said <WG3004> to him, Every <WG3956> man <WG444> at <WG4412> the beginning <WG4412> does set <WG5087> forth <WG5087> good <WG2570> wine; <WG3631> and when <WG3752> men have well <WG3184> drunk, <WG3184> then <WG5119> that which is worse: <WG1640> but you have kept <WG5083> the good <WG2570> wine <WG3631> until <WG2193> now. <WG737>

This <WG5026> beginning <WG746> of miracles <WG4592> did <WG4160> Jesus <WG2424> in Cana <WG2580> of Galilee, <WG1056> and manifested <WG5319> forth <WG5319> his glory; <WG1391> and his disciples <WG3101> believed <WG4100> on <WG1519> him.

After <WG3326> this <WG5124> he went <WG2597> down <WG2597> to Capernaum, <WG2584> he, and his mother, <WG3384> and his brothers, <WG80> and his disciples: <WG3101> and they continued <WG3306> there <WG1563> not many <WG4183> days. <WG2250>
And the Jews' <WG2453> passover <WG3957> was at <WG1451> hand, <WG1451> and Jesus <WG2424> went <WG305> up to Jerusalem. <WG2414>
And found <WG2147> in the temple <WG2411> those <WG3588> that sold <WG4453> oxen <WG1016> and sheep <WG4263> and doves, and the changers <WG2773> of money <WG2773> sitting: <WG2521>

And when he had made <WG4160> a whip <WG5416> of small <WG4979> cords, <WG4979> he drove <WG1544> them all <WG3956> out of the temple, <WG2411> and the sheep, <WG4263> and the oxen; <WG1016> and poured <WG1632> out the changers' <WG2855> money, <WG2772> and overthrew <WG390> the tables; <WG5132>

And said <WG2036> to them that sold <WG4453> doves, <WG4058> Take <WG142> these <WG5023> things hence; <WG1782> make <WG4160> not my Father's <WG3962> house <WG3624> an house <WG3624> of merchandise. <WG1712>
And his disciples <WG3101> remembered <WG3415> that it was written, <WG1125> The zeal <WG2205> of your <WG4675> house <WG3624> has eaten <WG2719> me up.
Then <WG3767> answered <WG611> the Jews <WG2453> and said <WG2036> to him, What <WG5101> sign <WG4592> show <WG1166> you to us, seeing that you do <WG4160> these <WG5023> things?
Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> to them, Destroy <WG3089> this <WG5126> temple, <WG3485> and in three <WG5140> days <WG2250> I will raise <WG1453> it up.

Then <WG3767> said <WG2036> the Jews, <WG2453> Forty <WG5062> and six <WG1803> years <WG2094> was this <WG3778> temple <WG3485> in building, <WG3618> and will you raise <WG1453> it up in three <WG5140> days? <WG2250>
But he spoke <WG3004> of the temple <WG3485> of his body. <WG4983>

When <WG3753> therefore <WG3767> he was risen <WG1453> from the dead, <WG3498> his disciples <WG3101> remembered <WG3415> that he had said <WG3004> this <WG5124> to them; and they believed <WG4100> the scripture, <WG1124> and the word <WG3056> which <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> had said. <WG2036>

Now <WG1161> when <WG5613> he was in Jerusalem <WG2414> at <WG1722> the passover, <WG3957> in the feast <WG1859> day, many <WG4183> believed <WG4100> in his name, <WG3686> when they saw <WG2334> the miracles <WG4592> which <WG3739> he did. <WG4160>
But Jesus <WG2424> did not commit <WG4100> himself <WG1438> to them, because <WG1223> he knew <WG1097> all <WG3956> men,
And needed <WG2192> <WG5532> not that any <WG5100> should testify <WG3140> of man: <WG444> for he knew <WG1097> what <WG5101> was in man. <WG444>
